name: Quiz for grafiskere og andre bildenerds og interesserte.
description:
Grafill Grafisk Design is once again hosting Quiz+Pils, this time taking place at MIR! 
The event is open to everyone, whether you're a working professional, student, or simply a design enthusiast. 
Bring a friend and join us for a relaxed evening of knowledge and good vibes.

When: Tuesday, February 24, 19:00 (quiz starts at approx. 19:30)
Where: MIR, Toftes Gate 69

:camera_with_flash: Please note: A photographer may be present, and photos may be shared on Grafillâ€™s website and social media
